review: Absolutely fantastic. That's it. Simple. You're going to love it.
author: Maria Ratliff

review: Great product - easy to use, easy to "install", great price
author: Lazy Cat Lady

review: Great UI / has all the top apps. perfect for a non smart TV
author: Brian L.

review: Still learning to use it, but so far it seems GREAT.  Very good picture quality.
author: Fred

review: I ordered this product and it took about a month to get it.  With that said I am very pleased with the Fire TV Stick.  This stick turns the TV into a smart  TV.  As an Amazon Prime member it is nice to be able to watch movies for free without going through another device.
author: Retired

review: Love to able to use YouTube and Netflix
author: Abdiel Torres
